product_title: Generic FP10355 BL Portable Washing Machine Blue
product_description: Twin Tub Design Equipped with two tubs our practical washing machine can operate the washer or spinner separately or run both sides at the same time providing you with a lot of convenience for daily use The two in one design saves space and money 3 Control Knobs Our washing machine has 3 knobs on the control panel and you can customize the wash timer wash selection and spin timer to choose the right time and wash mode including gentle normal or drain depending on the material of your clothes 26lbs Large Capacity Timer Function Designed with an 18 pound wash capacity and an 8 pound spin capacity this washer is convenient for washing shirts sweaters underwear socks and more You just need to put in your dirty clothes fill up the water set the timer and start washing the operation is very convenient High Efficiency Laundry Equipped with a powerful motor our washer washes at 280W and spins at 140W making the washing process very efficient In addition the drain pump can directly discharge the dirty water produced by the washing process Transparent Lid for Clear Washing Process The transparent washing machine cover allows you to view the washing process at any time and the plastic material is sturdy and durable number that will not rust The compact design makes it suitable for places where space is limited such as dormitories apartments RVs etc Note If you have any pre sales or after sales questions please contact us in time our professional and responsible team will give you an answer within 24 hours to help you solve the problem

reviews.review_body: Too small and doesn't dry  the clothes

product_title: Cilio Imola Insulated Beverage Server with Glass Liner Black 34 Ounce
product_description: Plastic insulated beverage server with tempered glass liner matte black 34 ounce 1 liter capacity hard tempered glass insert Screw on closure with convenient easy touch button one hand spout Keeps liquid hot up to 12 hours or cold up to 24 hours Hand washing recommended

reviews.review_body: I used this to keep hot chocolate warm for a Christmas event outdoor with my kids. It stored easily in a bag cooler, poured easily, & saved money. I might put a cold drink in it for them in the summer when out in the heat.

product_title: Peerless P2635LF BL Parkwood Lavatory Faucet Matte Black
product_description: EASY INSTALLATION Designed to fit 3 hole 4 in configurations DRAIN ASSEMBLY INCLUDED Pop up drain assembly in a coordinating finish is conveniently included to complete your look CERAMIC DISC TECHNOLOGY The ceramic discs inside the valve improve durability and give you smooth reliable motion in your bathroom faucet handle for years to come PURCHASE SUPPLY LINES SEPARATELY Standard supply lines are required for installation and must be purchased separately to complete the unit LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY You can install with confidence knowing Peerless bathroom faucets are backed by the Peerless Lifetime Limited Warranty

reviews.review_body: Got this for my dad who's updating his home before selling. Beautiful design. Easy to install according to my father and younger brother.

This review is for Peerless P2635LF-BN Parkwood Two Handle Lavatory Faucet Centerset, Brushed Nickel The installation was easy. The supply lines are included which helped the installation process a lot, the only struggle was to remove the old one. The nobs operate very smoothly don't require any effort to open or close and it is easy to set up the temperature. It looks really nice. I like the height not too tall or short. The water flow feels low at first but I think it is the best volume to conserve water instead of running it at full speed and wasting a lot of water. The only issue is that if somehow you drop water on top of the faucet once it dries it is going to show horrible watermarks. It is cleanable and disappears easily when wiped but the look is annoying. Other than that it is a great faucet.

Don't you hate it when you have a faucet that leaks, you have fixed it multiple times over the years and it starts dripping again.  Eventually you get to the point that all you want to do is rip out the old faucet and install a new one.  That happened to me with not one, but two faucets recently.  So, when I saw this Peerless faucet in my Vine reviewer queue, I leapt at the chance to try it out. The installation was completely textbook.  The top piece fit my sink perfectly.  The spigot and handle piece was easy to install.  I love that the threads on the mounting tubes went high enough to allow things to snug up nicely on my enamel-covered steel sink - it's not as thick as a ceramic sink - I've had problems with this in the past. If you have any experience replacing this kind of hardware, the installation should take you around 15-30 minutes (once you have the old hardware removed). The instructions are easy to follow...the figures and narrative text are both well done. Once in place, I love how they look. I do have one complaint that to me looks like a design flaw.  Once you have the entire thing installed, the rod (which is angled - I hate this) that you raise to lower the drain, rotates about 45 degrees to the right.  I mean, everything works just fine, but I guess I'm OCD enough that this bugs me enough to cost this product one star. It's now been in place and action for a couple of weeks.  No problems except for the one mentioned above. 4 stars
Very nice faucet, came with great instructions and was super easy to install.
I installed this faucet in my mom's bathroom. It took longer to remove the old faucet than it did to install this one. It is very well made and looks great.

We have hardwater and even with a water softener it takes a toll on all plumbing fixtures. This provided a nice upgrade/update to a much cleaner look than the old brass fixture. Installation was straight forward. Everything except silicone and plumber's tape was included in the box. Very nice economical fixture.

Just updating fixtures in the bathroom - most door pulls and knobs are satin or brushed nickel, so went with that for the faucet as well. This was easy to install, but be sure to have plumbing silicone on hand and ready. The old sink had a rubber seal for the drain fitting, so I overlooked that initially when installing this. Otherwise this just dropped in and was an easy install. The slightly higher rise of the faucet is nice, and the faucet handles move very smoothly allowing for great control of water volume. The drain stopper doesn't pull down flush and tight, but the rubber seal still holds water. I think it's by design that it doesn't pull down tight so you don't crush the rubber seal. My only complaint is the aerator is fully plastic, so I accidentally cross threaded it when I tried to put it back in after flushing the faucet. Removing it and reinstalling it fixed the problem, but I'm mildly concerned with longevity.

This was my first time installing a bathroom faucet. I was told by others that it's very easy and takes around 20 minutes. Well, it probably took me closer to 2 hours. But I got it done and only needed a wrench and pliers. I guess having silicone on hand would be ideal to make sure it's all water-tight, but I did not have this and just used what was left from my previous faucet. My previous faucet was an ugly (in my opinion) and outdated Peerless set and came with my house 5 years ago... so no telling how old it actually was. It was about time I got something more attractive and more my style. This was perfect in looks for what I wanted in my bathroom. I figured not having done these before that going with another Peerless brand faucet of the same general shape was the safest. It fit nearly perfect where the other had been. The drain is a bit narrower than the previous Peerless drain. And the main base part is shaped a little different, wider in parts and smaller in others, but overall it was close. I took the whole old thing out, besides the pipes and hoses as this didn't include replacements for those. I followed the directions diligently and often rereading it over because I didn't quite understand. But I do not believe I made any mistakes in the long run. At first the rubbery gasket underneath wasn't tightened enough and leaked when I turned the main back on (as I don't have a shut off under the sink). Fortunately I didn't turn on the water yet as the directions had told me to. And when I did turn it on, I thought to have the drain plugged at the time so it was slow... but potentially that's why it leaked more. However I got that sorted out and tightened it much better. I had a bit of an issue lining up the lever well and in the end find the plug and the stopper lever in back of it to be quite wiggly. On my old faucet the lever rested snuggly on the top... this one is wiggles either direction in the back and doesn't really have a resting place. You also have to lift it higher to get it to seal. Overall I'm pretty pleased with this. It's nice looking. And I'm happy I didn't have to hire someone to install. I am NOT a handy person... if I could install this just about anyone can!
neck is loose and now the handle is sticking, I have installed 1000 faucets and haven't come across one this bad. This thing hasn't even been used...  garbage

I really love the new faucet. I have a pedestal sink and was dreading replacing the faucet since everything I read up to two weeks ago stated I'd have to remove everything. Well, I found instructions that helped me keep the sink in place during replacement and was successful. This faucet is beautiful. My old faucet drain piece was rusting and peeling and definitely wasn't stainless steel under the chrome coating. this one seems to be much much better qualit and I'm hoping it will outlast us in this house. It looks great, the instructions are clear enough (I also had those separate instructions about the sink itself) and it entirely changes the look of my guest bathroom. Yes, it's a simple basic design, but the finish is so nice, that I'm thrilled with it. Highly recommended, no leaks so far!  I've had a peerless sink in my kitchen for years that worked well. That is recently replaced, too, but I was happy with the brand. It is an excellent quality affordable faucet option that is as well-made as the more expensive brands.

product_title: Appliance Parts 223 8 Range Drip Pan
product_description: Range Drip Pan 8 Drip Bowl Deep Dish Chrome Replaces Westh 5300147223 From The Brand Name Appliance Parts

reviews.review_body: Very shiny and perfect fit. Really made the old stove look 10 years younger.

product_title: Camco 00243 6 Universal Deluxe Plug-In
product_description: Item Package Dimension 11 09L x 7 09W x 2 09H inches Item Package Weight 0 8 Pounds Item Package Quantity 1 Product Type MAJOR HOME APPLIANCES

reviews.review_body: So so
For the price, It works great. Has fewer coils than the stock burners. Home depot wanted $40 for replacement burners! We opted for these and they work fine.
Fits on my older electric stove. Can't ask for more.
It has only FOUR turns, not six as pictured, and the element is narrower than the one I replaced.  Nothing deluxe about it.  It works, but I'll definitely shop around for a heavier element.

The product is satisfactory. The burner has the exact same configuration and markings as the broken one it replaced except where the model number was etched into the 'y' frame of the original burner there is a gind-off mark on the new one as if the model number was erased. It seems as if this Camco brand is just the Chromalox brand repackaged with the trade marks removed. I was a bit disappointed because Camco's web page explained that their burners had more coil turns than some other brands, and that is what made it 'deluxe'. When the new burner arrived it had the same number of turns (5) as the original. The picture is not accurate for this item because it clearly depicts 6 turns. Maybe the picture corresponds to the large size 8-inch burners. In any case, the quality is equal to the original and it is functional. I do not perceive anything about it that merits the 'deluxe' adjective.'

i was in a rental, and accidentally melted a plastic bowl onto the stove.  rather than have the landloard charge me a fortune for damage, i easily replaced it myself, cheaper than i thought it would be!

product_title: SPT THERMOELECTRIC WINE COOLER 20 BOTTLES
product_description: Digital controls with LED temperature display Environment friendly refrigerant free Quiet operation 30dBA Temperature display in F or C No vibration bottle sediment is not disturbed

reviews.review_body: You gave the measurments incorrectly....the first number is always the width not the depth so I had to return it. Hope I get my money back because it would not fit. Thanks, Rich Romanello

I just bought this a couple of weeks ago. It is great so far.  It holds either small bottles or large bottles of wine.  If you use large bottles, you just have to remove the shelf above.  It keeps the wine cool and is quiet.  The only draw back was that it was too tall to put on the counter if you have over counter cabinets.  I put it on a small table in the utility room.  It is a perfect size otherwise.

We have been very pleased with our wine cooler.  If I were to have any criticisms of it, it would be that it can be hard to fit  wine bottles that are bigger around into some shelves.  It doesn't always chill a wine as much as we prefer but that's more a personal preference since we like some of our wines to be cooler.

As other reviewers have mentioned, the listed dimensions are way off. Our 8-bottle cooler is 19.5 inches deep (meaning from front to back), 16 inches wide, and 10 inches high. The picture of the 8-bottle cooler is misleading because it doesn't really show how deep the unit is, and because of that, it won't fit many kitchen counters, including ours. We keep it on a small table in a nook that luckily was just the right size, otherwise we'd have no place for it. So measure your counter before you buy. Other than that, it has worked perfectly for us for about 6 weeks now and we really like it. We've been able to adjust temperature (we keep between 53 and 60 depending on contents) and it responds well. It's very quiet, almost completely silent, and no problems getting standard wine bottles to fit. I was concerned when we first turned it on because it did not seem to cool, but it just took a while for it to adjust and set itself.  Since then we've had no problems. Important: Read the simple & brief instruction manual before you turn it on.

I bought this unit last year right before Christmas from Walmart. A week ago it started to beep with lights flashing and as mentioned in other reviews the only way to stop it is to unplug it. The owner Manual doesn't help. Glad I got it on sale. Piece of garbage.  Save your money and store the ones you want chilled in the refrigerator.

Don't waste your money on this! I'd give this negative stars if I could. It rarely got to 50° and when it did get to 50°, that only lasted for a day or two after we got it. After that, it held steady at about 65-70° but would not get any lower, ever, no matter how many times we set it. Now it completely stopped working after not owning it for very long. So it's just a waste of space now.

I bought three of these last night at WalMart for $39 a piece. Added a 2 year WalMart warranty for $4 each. I loved the size and how they could actually fit 8 real bottles, including burgundy style bottles. The size is perfect for my application. I plugged them in and after about 2 hours, they were at 55F. I loaded one with 8 Italian-style bottles (long and skinny) and they fit very well! The other two I took out the bottom rack and put a magnum in sideways WITH 7 other bottles! The temp shot up to 65 on all of them (ambient temp + warm wine bottles), but they slowly fell to 55 over a few hours, which is better for wine. I hope these last a long time, since they are great for my application. I will come back in 6 months and do a follow-up. As of right now, they are working like champs!

We have had this unit for almost one year. We have it set for 55 degrees, and it keeps that temperature nailed. We have it set on a kitchen counter, adjacent to our ovens, but with the specified clearances for air flow at the sides and back. No complaints at all. We are considering purchasing a second one to give us more storage for red wines.

I've had my cellar frig for almost 2 years- works great actually I got 2 of them for my space. it is a wine cellar not cooler. if you want a cold wine then just get a small refrig, not a wine cellar refrig! it keeps wine at cellar temps. perfect for maintaining wines. when I'm ready to drink a white ...then I transfer to my main frig to cool it down to what I like to drink it at. good price.

This product has been okay for us. While it chills wine and seems to be made of great quality, we have had weekly trouble with it leaking water from the back. Not sure what the problem is but at the price we paid, I don't think we should have to deal with leaking water. Just saying...

This is a piece of junk. It can barely keep wine cool in the winter with the heat off. The fan runs all the time no matter what. Furthermore, when the room temperature is a tad bit above 70 degrees, the light starts flashing along with a constant beeping. The only way to stop this, is to unplug it. The manufacturer offers no suggestion other than saying it's probably the pc. In my mind 'pc' is personal computer, not microprocessor which is probably what is controlling the light flashing and beeping. The manufacturer offers no method of getting a unit which is properly working, even though they shipped the original flashing and beeping unit. They consider it yours because you, well, opened their box. This is the kind of treatment that gives a bad name to internet shopping.'

product_title: amarey Robot Vacuum Cleaner Replacment Brush
product_description: Constructed in sturdy yet economical wrought base of brass or stainless steel construction Feature concealed tamper proof mounting Shipped factory preassembled backplate to reduce installation cost Model number 407B10B

reviews.review_body: Nothing fancy, but simple enough to install and works so far.

The stopper does it's job for what I want it to do.  It hasn't fallen off the wall.  You install it by poking the screw through the little pinhole... Yes, I was trying to pull it apart until I realize that the screw can fit through that hole.  Not plastic, feels like good quality!  No directions were included in the package... guess it should be self explanatory. LOL.
Got this item for behind one of my doors that would hit the wall in a very specific spot (from the handle) & it was great. Fit perfect, easy to put up & problem was solved.
Looks brown or bronze.... not BLACK!!!i ordered specifically BLACK. Ugh

reviews.review_body: Easy to use and works for extending down rods.

product_description: 4 in H x 2 in W x 2 in L 0 5 lb Use to connect two 2 Kichler fan downrods together Oiled Bronze finish Available in 30 finishes Sold as one unit

reviews.review_body: Works great to join two rods together.  Overpriced though for a small metal piece.

product_description: Attaches two separate downrods together Available in a finish to match your current downrod or ceiling fan Fits only a downrod with a 1IN OD dimension

reviews.review_body: Had to modify it (no fault of the product) and it then worked as advertised.

product_title: Supco RCB1 Refrigeration Coil Brush
product_description: 12 brush length 27 ½ long 1 ½ and 3 4 bristle length Country of Origin CHINA

reviews.review_body: Bought a new condensor fan and motor and the company through this in for $4.99. In my not very scientific study, I would estimate that it removed about 15-20% of the dust, dog hair, etc from the bottom of the refrigerator but every little bit helps when it comes to maintaining proper air flow from front to back. On the upside, I've discovered that a strip of wire window screen placed behind the removable grille makes a lot more sense and could make me a millionaire.

Contrary to the photos for this item, it is not made to bend like shown in the photo. So if you are looking for a brush to reach around the corner you will just have to hope the wire under the bristles is flexible enough to do the trick.
Great product

product_title: Robertshaw 41 603 Ignitor
product_description: This is a Genuine OEM replacment part The Package Length of the product is 1 inches The Package Width of the product is 1 inches The Package Height of the product is 1 inches

reviews.review_body: This has been lighting my furnace for years now with no problems.

reviews.review_body: Fit old fans and look so much better

reviews.review_body: Ordered it based on the description and True item manufacture number and received the drain bottle (which is what I wanted). The picture showing a tower hose is wrong ordered on 1.14.19.

product_title: Janitized COM WISEN 4 5 Compostable Paper Premium Replacement Commercial Vacuum Bag for Windsor Sensor XP Versamatic Plus Triple S Prosense Kenmore 50015 vacuums Pack of 50
product_description: Biodegradable premium replacement commercial vacuum bags can be used for Kenmore Sss Prosense Windsor and Allstar Javelin vacuums cleaners 4 ply cellulose made from 100 percent renewable resources designed specifically for commercial use Premium filter bag that meets or exceed OEM filter efficiency Each filter bag is printed to easily identify the vacuum it fits Developed to biodegrade when aerobically composted reducing the amount of valuable resources entering into our landfills

reviews.review_body: I was trying them out for my cleaning business and decided that they would work fine; went to order more and they almost doubled the cost!!  Very disappointed when I saw that.  They did work as good as the name brand ones though.

product_title: Fanimation B5132DC Carved Rectangle Frame Wood Blade 22 Inch Dark Cherry Set of 5
product_description: This item has 22 long This item has 52 sweep Made in CHINA sold in sets of 5

reviews.review_body: Blades fit very well. We replaced the straw type blades with these. With the increased weight, the fan spins a little more once you shut it off, but that's just physics. Very quiet operation especially compared to the previous blades.
Easy upgrade, I was able to swap out the old palm leaf fan blades with these in 10 minutes. Now the fan actually feels cool and runs much quieter.

These beautiful real wood fan blades not only look good, but they are a perfect match for the palm leaf straw type blades that came with the fan originally, which were damaged through use. These blades have the mounting holes in the exact same place as the old blades and also have grooves cut into the blades that perfectly fit the mounting hardware. The actual color is as shown in the add picture and looks fantastic mounted on the fan.
